General.Name: Huaku Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Huaku Development Co., Ltd. builds, constructs, sells, and leases residential and commercial buildings in Taiwan and China. It also sells and leases general industrial factories and warehouses. The company was formerly known as Huaku Construction Co., Ltd. Huaku Development Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
